     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19620982">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19620982">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19620982">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19620982">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19620982" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19620983">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19620983">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19620983">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Getting to the full text
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19620983">
          <p>
           Once you have found the citation of a journal article you're interested in, click on the
           <strong>
            Check for Full Text
           </strong>
           <span>
            &nbsp;buttons
           </span>
           &nbsp;found next to the citation, or run a journal title search in Trexler Library's
           <a href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank">
            Encompass Search.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19620983" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19620984">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19620984">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19620984">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Supreme Court decisions
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19620984">
          <div id="boxatt19620984" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22943130">
              <a id="link_22943130" href="http://www.law.cornell.edu/supct/search/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22943130,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Endangered Writers', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22943130}); ">
               Legal Information Institute
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search as follows: morse v frederick. Contains syllabus, court opinion, concurring opinions, and and dissenting opinions.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22943227">
              <a id="link_22943227" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22943227,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Endangered Writers', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 22943227}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Available by library subscription. Typically includes full official report of case, briefs and other documents related to the case, prior history, disposition, case in brief, case summary, outcome, headnotes, syllabus, counsel, and all opinions.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19620986">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19620986">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19620986">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative secondary commentary in books
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19620986">
          <div id="boxatt19620986" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22943032">
              <a id="link_22943032" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22943032,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Endangered Writers', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19620987">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19620987">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19620987">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Authoritative secondary commentary in articles
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19620987">
          <div id="boxatt19620987" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22943234">
              <a id="link_22943234" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22943234,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Endangered Writers', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22943034">
              <a id="link_22943034" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=31h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22943034,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Endangered Writers', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12767749}); ">
               America History &amp; Life
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Library subscription databse. The standard index for peer-reviewed articles and book chapters on U.S. and Canadian history.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link22943035">
              <a id="link_22943035" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22943035,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Endangered Writers', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12286586}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Library subscription databse. Archive of the full text of numerous history journals from major academic presses.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19620988">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19620988">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19620988">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Newspaper articles of the time
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19620988">
          <div id="boxatt19620988" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link22943250">
              <a id="link_22943250" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.lexisnexis.com/hottopics/lnacademic" target="_blank" onclick="hit(22943250,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Endangered Writers', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12344568}); ">
               LexisNexis Academic
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of thousands of newspapers, magazines, broadcast transcripts, business publications, legal materials, and more, with coverage in the main from 1980 to present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25215605">
              <a id="link_25215605" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/1645522?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25215605,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Endangered Writers', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23392949}); ">
               New York Times Online
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Includes New York theatre reviews from 1850s to present.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link25222526">
              <a id="link_25222526" href="https://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/oclc/4299067?databaseList=1708,638" target="_blank" onclick="hit(25222526,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Endangered Writers', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 25222526}); ">
               Wall Street Journal
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5262557" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox19620989">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19620989">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19620989">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources in Chicago style (foot/endnotes and bibliography format)
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19620989">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit Trexler Library's
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           . Here is a
           <a href="https://www.zotero.org/support/">
            user guide
           </a>
           to Zotero. NOTE: In order to construct footnotes (as opposed to bibliography), the
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/support/word_processor_plugin_installation_for_zotero_2.1">
            MS Word Plug-In
           </a>
           is needed.
          </p>
          <p>
           For discussion and a tutorial on citation, visit IU Bloomington's
           <a href="https://www.indiana.edu/~istd/practice.html">
            How to Recognize Plagiarism
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19620989" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox19620990">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="19620990">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title19620990">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content19620990">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt19620990" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
